creator: rpluem@apache.org
text:
--with-pic was removed when the build system was refactored from scratch in
httpd 2.0. It is no longer present.

(In reply to comment #1)
> --with-pic was removed when the build system was refactored from scratch in
> httpd 2.0. It is no longer present.
> 
Please add this information in changes or changelog file for Apache 2.2.x
Strange because the command-line --with-pic works fine
with Apache 2.0.59 and not in Apache 2.2.10.
OK for the answer.
